title: Drink the River, Eat Like Royalty
description:
Goldie and Grumbles are tired of fishing, and Goldie has an idea that might change everything! But will it actually work?

If you would like to support Stories Podcast, you can subscribe and give us a five star review on iTunes, head to patreon.com/stories and pledge to make a monthly donation, or just tell your friends about us! You can also support our sponsors!

Thank you!!
